backend/main.mo: Actor initializes curatedAnswers map and ties in migration run logic.
backend/migration.mo: Defines old/new actor types and provides default curatedAnswers for migration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains frontend file paths with short descriptive summaries for each component or asset.
frontend/docs/smoke-test-assistant.md: Smoke test checklist describing steps to verify assistant health, Q&A flow, and recovery behavior.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH design tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file defining metadata, social tags, and mounting point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component assembling all page sections and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/AssistantSection: Interactive AI assistant component handling user questions, backend health gating, and answer fetching.
frontend/src/components/BackendHealthBan: Displays a warning banner when the backend health check reports an unhealthy state.
frontend/src/components/CapabilitiesSect: Renders categorized AI capability cards using structured content data.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact form that builds a mailto link, triggers email client, and shows a temporary success alert.
frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx: FAQ accordion listing common questions and detailed answers about the service.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner with marketing messaging, demo CTA button, and scroll-to-contact functionality.
frontend/src/components/HowItWorksSectio: Renders a multi-step workflow and safe testing practices using mapped content arrays and stylized cards.
frontend/src/components/SafetySecuritySe: Displays a grid of security features with icons, descriptions, and details for each item.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Provides a footer with branding, navigation buttons using smooth-scroll, and external links.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements a responsive header with scroll-based styling, navigation, mobile menu, and demo link.
frontend/src/components/TryDemoSection.t: Shows suggested prompts in card format and provides a link to launch the demo environment.
Lists industry-specific use cases with icons, descriptions, examples, and tags.
frontend/src/content/capabilities.ts: Defines categorized AI capability metadata including descriptions, inputs, outputs, and tags for UI display.
frontend/src/content/howItWorks.ts: Provides workflow steps and safe testing practices used to render process and security guidance in the UI.
frontend/src/content/tryDemo.ts: Contains suggested demo prompts with categories and expected outputs for guiding user testing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Performs periodic backend health checks via the actor and derives a normalized healthy/checking/unhealthy status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, handling login flow, and exposing context hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation for getAnswer calls with input validation, backend health checks, and IC error sanitization.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes with strict grayscale and accent rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with query and identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/utils/icErrors.ts: Provides detection and sanitization utilities for IC replica errors with safe user-facing messages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color system, typography/plugins, and extended theme settings for layout, fonts, shadows, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, branding requirements, architectural notes, and known issues, emphasizing the Nexus Forge AI rebrand and fixing deployment and assistant functionality problems.
